response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its purpose to you. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exceptional offer is designed to provide you with a significant discount compared to its market value, while also ensuring that I receive a fair compensation for it. I believe that this product could bring immense value to your life or business, and I am eager to see it in capable hands. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
